title: Miss McGhee: Young Love
description: When Mary McGhee moved to a small Alabama town shortly after the Second World War, she was sure she could change her life for good: a new job, a new place, and a chance for a new life. But then she met Lila Dubose, the wife of her new employer.Set in the shadow of the civil rights movement, Miss McGhee is a sweeping tale of forbidden love in a turbulent time.Miss McGhee is a runner-up for the first annual Bywater Prize for Fiction.
author: Bett Norris
